uploadMediaTooltip: Upload an image, GIF, or video representing your memecoin.
coinNameTooltip: Enter the full name of your memecoin.
tickerTooltip: The ticker symbol represents your coin (3-5 uppercase letters).
blockchainTooltip: Select the blockchain platform where your coin will be launched.
descriptionTooltip: Provide a brief description (max 250 characters) of your memecoin.
hashtagsTooltip: Add relevant hashtags to increase visibility. Click the + button to add.
listingPreferenceTooltip: Choose between voting process or fast-paced listing (requires dev vesting).
fastPacedListingTooltip: While faster, it may reduce trust and community engagement.
whoTooltip: Select the group responsible for vesting.
releaseDateTooltip: Select the date when vesting starts (at least 3 days from today).
releasePercentageTooltip: Enter the percentage of the total supply to be released.
staggeredVestingTooltip: Enable staggered vesting to release tokens in intervals.
staggerIntervalDaysTooltip: Number of days between each vesting release.
staggerPercentageTooltip: Percentage of tokens to release at each interval. Total must be 100%.
airdropAmountTooltip: Enter the percentage of the total supply to airdrop to Cryptowny users for completing tasks.
stakingPoolAllocationTooltip: Enter the percentage of the total supply allocated to the staking pool.
stakingPoolDurationTooltip: Enter the duration for the staking pool in days.
websiteTooltip: Enter your coin's official website URL.
twitterTooltip: Enter your coin's Twitter profile URL.
instagramTooltip: Enter your coin's Instagram profile URL.
telegramTooltip: Enter your coin's Telegram group URL.
persistentWarning: Once created, the data cannot be modified.
fastPacedListingDescription: Choosing Fast-Paced Listing means skipping the community voting process. While this allows for quicker listing, it may reduce trust among potential investors and limit community engagement. Cryptowny recommends going through the voting process to build trust, engage with the community, and increase your coin's visibility.
airdropAmountMustBeBetween0And100: Airdrop amount must be between 0 and 100%.
mustBeLoggedInToCreateCoin: You must be logged in to create a coin.
coinIdNotFound: Coin ID not found in the response.
milestoneFieldsRequired: Both date and description are required for milestones.
howItWorksDescription: Welcome to Cryptowny! Here's how it works...
